str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From epi and ouranos; above the sky.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
